column2: Chevron starts natural gas production from two new wells in Bangladesh DHAKA
column3: Dec 6 Chevron has started producing gas from two new wells in the Bangladeshi state of Sylhet
column4: aimed at easing the country's chronic energy shortages.

column2: From Bangladesh flood map to the Bank of England
column3: a "carbon bubble" is born * City analyst found asset prices ignored risk of lower carbon use

J&J; leukemia drug cuts death risk vs chemo in new patients-study Dec 6 Johnson & Johnson's and AbbVie's  cancer drug Imbruvica significantly reduced the risk of death and disease progression compared with chemotherapy in previously untreated patients with a type of leukemia in a late stage study
column4: paving the way for an expanded approval of the medicine.
